channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wedding Day; Party Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny and Granpapa: A magical card arrives in the Little Kingdom, inviting everyone to a party at Granny and Granpapa Thistle's castle in the clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Doll Hospital: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's Birthday: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George's Wooly Hat: George has a new hat and Mummy Pig is determined that George doesn't get it muddy when visiting Grandpa and Granny Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Canal Boat: It's Captain Daddy Dog's birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isn't quite what he had expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Planes, Trains, and Kitty Balloons!: Gabby unboxes a passport-like travel book and three tickets that take her on a dollhouse travel adventure. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye: When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Go for the Gold: Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mini Patrol and the Pups race the rain in 'Pups Save the Chalk Art', then in 'Pups Save the Hot Potato', Farmer Al and Yumi's garden is full of holes and a unique potato is missing. (S7, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups must get some penguins back to their home in 'Pups Save the Jungle Penguins', then in 'Pups Save a Freighter', Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse as a ship approaches. (S6, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Digi and Tal get stuck on top of a giant Robo-Ducky in 'Pups vs. The Robo-Ducky', then in 'Pups Save the Lost Penguin', Chickaletta switches places with a Baby Penguin. (S11, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Storm and the Lost Talisman: Gargamel is looking for a talisman that will help him to find the Smurfies' village. Storm decides that she's going to get there before him. But it's a trap! (S4, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Carlita the Ice Cream Truck!: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is.there's no ice cream! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Rocketship Ride: Darington can't wait to ride the tallest, fastest carnival ride in all of Axle City! But when Darington's tickets blow away, he and Blaze must try to retrieve them! (S9, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: There's a runaway rocket in 'Rocket Rescuers', then in 'The Golden Lion Mask', the Ruff-Ruff Pack swipes a priceless golden lion mask from the museum. (S9, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: An injured baby monkey is rescued in 'The Cat That Roared', then in 'Saving the Safe', Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe. (S9, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Stone Age Granny: Granny and her friends historical re-enactment society are being cave people. Peppa and George join in helping to catch Grandpa Pig who is dressed as a mammoth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Trampolines: Peppa and her friends head to the trampoline park where Miss Rabbit shows them how to bounce. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig and Mummy Sheep decide they want to have a go at trampolining.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A Day With Doctor Hamster; Police Car: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Viking Day; Parachute Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Birthday; Windmills: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Journey to the Centre of the Earth: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Sleepover: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Playgroup: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, Mrs Elf becomes the twins' new teacher.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Birthday: It's King Thistle's birthday, but he does not want a birthday party. But Gaston the ladybird has never had a birthday party, so King Thistle says it can be Gaston's birthday party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Betty Caterpillar: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Giants in the Meadow: Lucy's dad is digging up the meadow and the Little Kingdom is in danger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: We see a strange land where Chickaletta is royalty in 'Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck', then in 'Pups Save a Desert Flounder', Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Grumples make 'Troll Jelly', and then in 'Catch That Kitty', Dora recovers the artifact El Gatito Magico. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat's Puzzle Hunt: The Gabby Cats have set up a puzzle hunt in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy solve riddles, look for clues and complete puzzle challenges. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Potato Comes To Town; Chloe's Puppet Show: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fun Run; Cuckoo Clock: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Molly Mole; The Power Cut: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig loves to watch TV, but Peppa Pig thinks that he needs to do some exercise in 'Daddy Gets Fit', then it's time to tidy up the bedroom in 'Tidying Up', although it doesn't last very long.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Pet: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel needs someone to watch over the Smurfs he's captured in 'Lucretia Seizes Power', then in 'Papa Smurf Lost His Mind', Papa Smurf loses his memory and starts acting like a child. (S4, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Cap'n Turbot's boat is starting to sink in 'Pups Save a Floundering Francois', and then in 'Pups Save the Pop Up Penguins', stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs in 'Pups Save the Runaway Turtles', then in 'Pups Save the Shivering Sheep', Farmer Al's sheep run away, and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew helps Charger fall asleep in 'The Crew Builds Charger a Super Bed', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Squirrely Whirly Playground', the pups play like Super Squirrely Whirly. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Tyre Trouble: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres! (S8, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Space Alien Adventure!: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him fly home to his alien family! (S5, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Journey to the Centre of the Earth: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Cows: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Club House; Funny Music: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Shop: The new club house has a little counter, ideal for playing shop. But what will the children's new club house shop sell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Buttercups, Daisies and Dandelions: During a picnic in her garden, cousin Chloe shows Peppa and George fun things to do with wild flowers.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mr. Porter's high-tech waiter robot can't stop cleaning in 'Pups Save a Waiter-Bot', then in 'Pups Stop a Pie-Clone', Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! (S7, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox in 'Pups Save a Jukebox', then in 'Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire', a hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go wrong. (S9, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Movie Night: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood; Sunny Day Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden: Peppa and family come to help make a garden on the roof of the apartments. Mr Bull assists with a big truck and crane. There is even a little something for Mrs Duck! (S7, ep 31).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Journey to the Centre of the Earth: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.desc: Lucy's Sleepover: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.
